entry.title: Russia Orders Troops to Target Ukraine's Western-Supplied Long-Range Weapons
entry.content: A recent shipment of advanced Western weapons has reinforced Ukraine’s efforts to fend off Russia’s invasion, but whether they will enable Kyiv to turn the tide remains unclear.

entry.title: Air Travel Is Broken. Here's Why.
entry.content: Cutbacks in 2020 mean there aren’t enough baggage handlers, pilots and many others. So when something goes wrong, it ripples through to long lines, flight delays, cancellations and lost luggage.

entry.title: Maternity Care Is Faltering Under the Taliban
entry.content: Decades of progress in maternal and neonatal healthcare in Afghanistan are eroding due to hunger, fleeing hospital staff and curbs on women’s freedom, doctors and international organizations say.
